creator: janakadalugama@gmail.com
text:
I ANT sql task, there is an attribute call "delimiter" 
when the sql scripts are running this will find exact delimiter with the 
case sensitive manner, in MS SQL  I use "go" for delimiter,
But my divelopers keep this as "go","GO","Go" and "gO"
can you please give me a solution for this 

thanks 
Janaka

creator: stevel@apache.org
text: why not use ; as the delimiter, as it is by default?
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 26459 ***
creator: bodewig@apache.org
